sentences: Ta on mänginud klaverit lapsest saati.
context: The word 'mänginud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'mängima', which means 'to play'. It's used to indicate an action that has been completed. In English, it can be translated as 'played', 'has played' (present perfect), or 'had played' (past perfect) depending on the context and tense being expressed. This form is commonly used with auxiliary verbs like 'on' (has/have) to form compound tenses in Estonian.
